metadata.title: CVE-2015-8377 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the host_new_graphs_save function ingraphs_new.php in Cacti 0.8.8f and earlier allows remote authenticatedusers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via crafted serialized data in theselected_graphs_array parameter in a save action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.1').
